text:
September 29, 1954
Mr. John T, Suchy
501 Eddy Avenue
Missoula, Montana
Dear Johns
Thanks for your introduction, With only minor changes, this
whole work should be available in time for the New York Convention.
3inoe we don’t have a copy of the thesis, and X am not sure
we will have, I have indicated that it would be available **from the
author. * In case we get a copy, you can of course always refer requests
to us. However, I don’t want to assume responsibility for this library
function, and think it could best be handled by the Iowa Library.
Sincerely,
HJSswc
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
